item.title: Image Augmentation and Auxiliary Loss Duo
item.description: Implemented and experimented with a new model based on image reconstruction and augmentation. Reproduced AAAI’21 paper on Improving Sample Efficiency in Model-Free Reinforcement Learning from Images.

item.title: HTTP Authentication
item.description: Implemented Java Library for secure HTTP Authentication using Java Cryptography Architecture.

item.title: Gaussian Process Kernels
item.description: A term project on Local and Global Approximation techniques for Gaussian Process Kernels, followed by experiments on numerous approximation prevailing techniques.

item.title: RISC Processor
item.description:
Computer Architecture Course Project

Developed a Reduced Instruction Set Computer Processor and simulated on FPGA Spartan 3 boards using VERILOG

item.title: TinyC Compiler
item.description:
Compilers Course Project

Implemented a Compiler for language TinyC, a subset of C with a reduced subset of functionalities with a parser and lexer with output as non-optimized machine-level assembly language instructions using Yacc, BISON, FLEX, C, C++.

item.title: Shoten : An e-BookStore
item.description:
Software Engineering Course Term Project

Full Stack development of online bookstore employing HTML, CSS, JSP and MySQL
